data.comment: The big names in today's match at Saitama Stadium 2002 have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Kawasaki.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 3, Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 6, Ryuji Sato signals a Urawa throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 11, Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Ryuji Sato awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kawasaki.
In Saitama Urawa attack through Leonardo. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 16, In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kai Shibato is booked for the home team.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Kawasaki's Ryota Ohshima gets in a shot on goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Can Urawa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 28, In Saitama Kawasaki drive forward through Ryota Ohshima. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in Urawa.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 35, In Saitama, Urawa push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Jesiel for Kawasaki has been booked by Ryuji Sato and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Miki Yamane.
Great play from Akihiro Ienaga to set up the goal.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Miki Yamane of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ryuji Sato signals a Urawa throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 43, Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ryuji Sato awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
The first-half is over at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a first substitution, with Ao Tanaka replacing Ryota Ohshima.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 50, Goal! Yu Kobayashi extends Kawasaki lead to 0-2 with a header.
Manabu Saito instrumental with a fine assist.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 52, Urawa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
The home team replace Kenyu Sugimoto with Shinzo Koroki.
In the minute 53, Quenten Martinus is replacing Takahiro Sekine for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Urawa have a goal kick.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 58, Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Kawasaki are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 68, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Toru Oniki is making the team's second substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Reo Hatate replacing Yasuto Wakizaka.
Kawasaki make their third substitution with Leandro Damiao replacing Yu Kobayashi.
In the minute 75, Yuki Muto is on a sub for Yosuke Kashiwagi for Urawa.
Ryuji Sato awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Kazuki Nagasawa is replacing Ewerton for the home team.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Kawasaki are coming forward and Manabu Saito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Ryuji Sato signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Urawa's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
The home team have replaced Thomas Deng with Katsuya Iwatake. This is the fifth substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
In the minute 84, Urawa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki just outside Urawa's area.
Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Important block from the Urawa defence as Reo Hatate fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Kawasaki!
Shintaro Kurumaya is on a sub for Kyohei Noborizato for Kawasaki.
In the minute 89, Taisei Miyashiro is replacing Manabu Saito for the away team.
Urawa's Katsuya Iwatake breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ryuji Sato awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kawasaki.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In Saitama Kawasaki attack through Ao Tanaka. The finish is off target, however.
Ryuji Sato awards Urawa a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
Leandro Damiao puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
